content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/spring-demo is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

Steps I should follow:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Check the pom.xml to see current Java version and dependencies
3. Update Java version to 17
4. Update dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions
5. Check for any Java 8 specific code that needs to be updated
6. Run `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works

Let's start by viewing the repository structure.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>love.wangqi</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-demo</artifactId>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>
    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <modules>
        <module>m1</module>
        <module>m2</module>
        <module>m3</module>
        <module>m4</module>
    </modules>

    <name>spring-demo</name>
    <!-- FIXME change it to the project's website -->
    <url>http://www.example.com</url>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>
        <spring.version>5.1.2.RELEASE</spring.version>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>4.11</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-context</artifactId>
            <version>${spring.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>ch.qos.logback</groupId>
            <artifactId>logback-classic</artifactId>
            <version>1.2.3</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <pluginManagement><!-- lock down plugins versions to avoid using Maven defaults (may be moved to parent pom) -->
            <plugins>
                <!-- clean lifecycle, see https://maven.apache.org/ref/current/maven-core/lifecycles.html#clean_Lifecycle -->
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-clean-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.1.0</version>
                </plugin>
                <!-- default lifecycle, jar packaging: see https://maven.apache.org/ref/current/maven-core/default-bindings.html#Plugin_bindings_for_jar_packaging -->
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-resources-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.2</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.8.0</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.22.1</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.2</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-install-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.5.2</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.8.2</version>
                </plugin>
                <!-- site lifecycle, see https://maven.apache.org/ref/current/maven-core/lifecycles.html#site_Lifecycle -->
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.7.1</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-project-info-reports-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>
</project>

    <build>

Perfect! Major version 61 corresponds to Java 17 (Java 17 = 61, Java 11 = 55, Java 8 = 52). Let me run a comprehensive test to make sure everything works:

input.file_text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Migration Date
2026-01-29

## Overview
Successfully migrated the spring-demo project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. Java Version Update (pom.xml)
- **maven.compiler.source**: `1.8` → `17`
- **maven.compiler.target**: `1.8` → `17`

### 2. Dependency Updates

#### Spring Framework
- **Version**: `5.1.2.RELEASE` → `6.1.13`
- **Reason**: Spring 6.x is required for Java 17 support and includes performance improvements and bug fixes

#### JUnit
- **Version**: `4.11` → `4.13.2`
- **Reason**: Bug fixes and security updates

#### Logback Classic
- **Version**: `1.2.3` → `1.5.8`
- **Reason**: Java 17 compatibility and security updates

### 3. Maven Plugin Updates

#### maven-compiler-plugin
- **Version**: `3.8.0` → `3.11.0`
- **Reason**: Better Java 17 support

#### maven-surefire-plugin
- **Version**: `2.22.1` → `3.0.0`
- **Reason**: Improved Java 17 compatibility

## Verification Results

### Build Status
✅ **BUILD SUCCESS**

### Test Results
- Tests run: 1
- Failures: 0
- Errors: 0
- Skipped: 0

### Compilation Target
- Verified bytecode major version: 61 (Java 17)

### Runtime Test
- Successfully ran sample application (m1/Main.java)
- Spring context initialized correctly with Spring 6.1.13
- All beans loaded and autowired successfully

## Code Changes
**No code changes were required** - the existing Java code is fully compatible with Java 17 and Spring 6.

## Notes
- The project did not use any javax.* packages that would need migration to jakarta.* (a common requirement when upgrading to Spring 6)
- All modules (m1, m2, m3, m4) build and run successfully
- The migration maintains backward compatibility with the existing API

## Commands to Verify

```bash
# Clean build with verification
mvn clean verify

# Check Java version
java -version

# Check compiled bytecode version
javap -v target/classes/love/wangqi/Main.class | grep "major version"

# Run sample application
cd m1
java -cp "target/classes:$(mvn dependency:build-classpath -q -DincludeScope=runtime -Dmdep.outputFile=/dev/stdout)" love.wangqi.Main
```

## Conclusion
The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been completed successfully. All tests pass, and the application runs correctly with the updated dependencies.

# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration - Quick Reference

## Files Modified
- `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/spring-demo/pom.xml`

## Changes Summary

### Java Version
```xml
<!-- BEFORE -->
<maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>
<maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>

<!-- AFTER -->
<maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
<maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
```

### Dependencies
| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| Spring Framework | 5.1.2.RELEASE | 6.1.13 |
| JUnit | 4.11 | 4.13.2 |
| Logback Classic | 1.2.3 | 1.5.8 |

### Maven Plugins
| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.8.0 | 3.11.0 |
| maven-surefire-plugin | 2.22.1 | 3.0.0 |

## Validation
✅ All modules compile successfully with Java 17
✅ All tests pass (1 test, 0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skipped)
✅ Bytecode target verified as Java 17 (major version 61)
✅ Runtime execution confirmed with Spring 6.1.13
✅ No code changes required

## Build Command
```bash
mvn clean verify
```

## Summary

I have successfully migrated the Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Here's what was accomplished:

### ✅ **Migration Complete - BUILD SUCCESS**

### Changes Made:

1. **Java Version Update** (in `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/spring-demo/pom.xml`):
   - Updated `maven.compiler.source` and `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`

2. **Dependency Updates**:
   - **Spring Framework**: `5.1.2.RELEASE` → `6.1.13` (Java 17 compatible)
   - **JUnit**: `4.11` → `4.13.2` (bug fixes and security updates)
   - **Logback Classic**: `1.2.3` → `1.5.8` (Java 17 compatible)

3. **Maven Plugin Updates**:
   - **maven-compiler-plugin**: `3.8.0` → `3.11.0` (better Java 17 support)
   - **maven-surefire-plugin**: `2.22.1` → `3.0.0` (improved Java 17 compatibility)

### Verification Results:

✅ **Build Status**: SUCCESS  
✅ **Compilation**: All 4 modules (m1, m2, m3, m4) compile successfully with Java 17  
✅ **Tests**: All tests pass (1 test, 0 failures, 0 errors)  
✅ **Bytecode**: Verified as Java 17 (major version 61)  
✅ **Runtime**: Successfully executed sample application with Spring 6.1.13  
✅ **No Code Changes Required**: All existing Java code is fully compatible

### Documentation Created:
- `MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md` - Detailed migration documentation
- `MIGRATION_QUICKREF.md` - Quick reference guide

The project is now fully migrated to Java 17 and all tests pass with `mvn clean verify`.
